answers.answer: Your question is meaningless without an exact word-for-word copy of the medical examimers report.
Sorry, MEDICAL EXAMINER'S report. And they don't usually release these, except to family members, and then you have to pull teeth to get them.
when my husband passed away i got his, it was not pulling teeth , if your spouce you can get it , or mom or dad. they have to give to you .

question: a patient aged 62 died of a heart attack but there was no evidence of myocardial infarction after autospy was done.whyhistoryhe used to some 60 cig every day for more than 30 years.also he was suffering from diabetes and high blood pressure.
title: heart attack
